name: Love Convention - DEMO
description:
This is a Demo game for our upcoming Visual novel game planned to be released on 2019.

Love Convention is a visual novel dating game about Japanese Pop Culture. In this game you can try to date one of the heroines that resemble things at Japanese Pop Culture Industry such as cosplayer and comic artist.

This DEMO game of 2 first ingame day doesn't include :

  1. Save and Load function
  2. Log function
  3. Sound Effect
  4. CGI/special cinematic artwork
  5. Cool things that might be added later

And those things will be available at the full version game.

We planned the game to be free to play at Playstore. We would be happy to hear feedbacks from you guys.

Thank you!

Follow us on facebook and instagram!
